details.Notes: Approved in 2017.  Initially approved for pediatric and young adult patients with a form of acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL). Later it also got approved for adult patients with relapsed or refractory (r/r) large B-cell lymphoma after two or more lines of systemic therapy.
Approved in 2017. It is approved for adult patients with relapsed or refractory large B-cell lymphoma after two or more lines of systemic therapy.
Approved in 2020. It is approved for adult patients with relapsed or refractory mantle cell lymphoma (MCL).
Approved in 2021. It is approved for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory large B-cell lymphoma after two or more lines of systemic therapy.

items.description: FDA considering for adults and maternal use in 2023.

details.Notes: Advisers voted 14-0 and 10-4 (safety for infant use and a closer 7-4 for older adults use in separate 2023 votes, approvals due August and May, respectively.

items.description: First RSV vaccine to win U.S. approval, in May 2023.

details.Notes: Cleared only for use in adults 60 years or older.

details.Prevnar-20: 20-strain pneumococcal shot OK'd for infants and children in April 2023 and OK'd in adults in 2021.
